article_title: BRISTOL: The election? It's all about the economy
article_text:

og.description: It seems pretty clear that the presidential campaign in the fall is going to focus on the declining fortunes of the middle class. That in turn could lead businesses to rethink decisions which have contributed to stagnant wages and a whole host of social ills.
